remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式设置和布局[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档允许内容在语义形式如段落、 表格中的行为的不同部分，并列出。The formatting and layout of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document enables different parts of the content to behave in a semantic form such as in paragraphs, tables, and lists. 用户所能觉察出其外观; 中的内容的语义结构但的物理格式和标记布局不显式标识的实际的语义元素。Humans can perceive the semantic structure of the content from its appearance; but the physical format and layout of the markup does not explicitly identify the actual semantic elements. 若要启用的文档组织中，以编程方式了解命名空间提供可用于定义文档由其语义部分的结构元素。To enable programmatic understanding of the document organization, the namespace provides structure elements that can be used to define the document by its semantic parts. 每个页面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档包含定义元素及其*内容*位置文本运行和图形形式。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 通过使用文档结构元素，页[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档还可以与定义的元素*结构*中的部分、 段落、 列表、 图形，窗体页面和表。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 类用于定义的文档标记的内容和结构的各部分之间的关联。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. A是结构化元素，如位于表单元格或项目符号列表项的子级页面层次结构。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. A标识中的项同一页上的层次结构。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它是指项是结构化元素的内容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 创建应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档不需要包含结构标记，但文档结构元素的使用增强的灵活性依据应用程序可以访问和使用文档的内容。Applications that create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents are not required to include structural markup, but use of document structure elements enhances the flexibility by which applications can access and use the content of a document. 有关结构元素的详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，请参阅第 9 章和附录 E 的 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).
